def_cn: 起初的；最初的；原先的；原来的
def_en: You use original when referring to something that existed at the beginning of a process or activity, or the characteristics that something had when it began or was made.

def_cn: 原物；原件；原作；原著；原文
def_en: If something such as a document, a work of art, or a piece of writing is an original, it is not a copy or a later version.

def_cn: 原物的；原件的；原作的；非复制的
def_en: An original document or work of art is not a copy.

def_cn: 新创作的；未发表的；未发行的；未曾演出的
def_en: An original piece of writing or music was written recently and has not been published or performed before.
If you describe someone or their work as original, you mean that they are very imaginative and have new ideas.
If you read or sing something in the original or, for example, in the original French, you read or sing it in the language it was written in, rather than a translation.
